flow.doc:description: Creates or locates existing patient records in the hospital's system.
flow.name: PatientService

dw:transform-message.doc:name: upsertPatientRequest to upsertPatientResponse
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %namespace ns0 http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/message/1.0 %namespace ns1 http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/model/1.0 %input payload application/xml %output application/xml --- ns0#"upsertPatientResponse": { ns1#"PatientId": now as :string }

dw:transform-message.doc:name: getPatient to getPatientResponse
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %namespace ns0 http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/message/1.0 %namespace ns1 http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/model/1.0 %input payload application/xml %output application/xml --- ns0#"getPatientResponse": { ns1#"Patient": { patientId: now as :string, dateOfBirth: |1930-01-01|, gender: "Male", nationality: "USA", address1: "DisneyLand", lastName: "Duck", firstName: "Donald", nationalId: now as :string } }

flow.doc:description: Creates or locates existing patient episodes in the hospital's system.
flow.name: EHRService

dw:transform-message.doc:name: createEpisode to createEpisodeResponse
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %namespace ns0 http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/message/1.0 %namespace ns1 http://www.mule-health.com/SOA/model/1.0 %input payload application/xml %output application/xml --- ns0#"createEpisodeResponse": { ns1#"Episode": { episodeId: now as :string, "ns1:patientId": payload.createEpisode."ns1:PatientId", admission: "Elective", startDate: now, endDate: now, care: "Private" } }
